description: Harissa spiced broccoli steaks are deliciously charred and smoky with an easy and hearty lentil salad.
name: Broccoli Steaks with Lentils & Sundried Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 heads broccoli, centres sliced into 4 1cm thick steaks

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the harissa with the oil and brush on the broccoli steaks, coating well. Reserve the remaining mix and keep the offcuts of broccoli for another recipe.

Heat a griddle pan on the highest setting and add the broccoli steaks, searing for 3-4 minutes on each side until lightly charred and softened. Add the lemons to the pan and char alongside the broccoli.
In large bowl, combine the lentils, chopped sundried tomatoes, chopped herbs, rocket and crumbled feta. Squeeze over half the charred lemon juice.
Divide the lentil salad between 4 plates, top each with a broccoli steak, drizzle of harissa oil and chopped pistachios. Season with more lemon juice if desired.
